title: Ep100: Spank Me! Please Me! feat King Noire
itunes:title: Ep100: Spank Me! Please Me! feat King Noire
description:
It's the 100th Episode Whores!! We made it! This week we are joined by a very special guest, master fetish trainer and adult entertainer King Noire. In this episode, we discuss achieving orgasms without, fetish training and what it is, along with the proper way to slap during sex. King Noire then breaks it down for the men who want to achieve pleasing a woman in bed. Making pleasure a priority over simply nutting. The conversation is all about sex and pleasure this week and we hope you all enjoy. This week's episode is brought to you by Adam & Eve. Use Promocode WD50 and get 50% any one item on the site + receive 10 Free gifts! Also, be sure to take the media survey at Podsurvey.com/WHOREIBLE so that we can learn alittle bit more about you guys! Follow this week's guest on social media @KingNoire on Instagram Follow us on social media and let's discuss this week's episode!
